output.sentences: Everyone is working hard at organizing the graduation ceremony on Friday.
All of the students march at the quad to receive their diplomas.
The view of the stage was really good from our seats.
After they graduate, this student  leaves her class and returns to her family members.
Her family is very happy that she was a part of this ceremony.
